readable.content: A man in a hat and sunglasses reads a book on a park bench . A man in c camouflage cap and jeans is sitting on a bench reading a book . A man is sitting on a bench and reading a book . A man on a park bench reads a novel . A man wearing a camouflage hat and sunglasses reading a book on a black metal bench .
